name: Custom Ticket Report
query:
SELECT
    name AS "Ticket ID:Link/HD Ticket",
    subject AS "Subject",
    status AS "Status",
    priority AS "Priority",
    owner AS "Owner:Link/User",
    agent_group AS "Agent Group:Link/HD Team",
    customer_name AS "Customer Name:Link/HD Customer"
FROM
    `tabHD Ticket`
LEFT JOIN
    `tabCustomer Name` ON `tabHD Ticket`.custom_customer_name = `tabCustomer Name`.name
WHERE
    `tabHD Ticket`.docstatus < 2
    AND (IFNULL(%(status)s, '') = '' OR `tabHD Ticket`.status = %(status)s)
    AND (IFNULL(%(customer_name)s, '') = '' OR `tabHD Ticket`.custom_customer_name = %(customer_name)s)
report_script:
def execute(filters=None):
    columns = [
        {"label": "Ticket ID", "fieldname": "name", "fieldtype": "Link", "options": "HD Ticket", "width": 120},
        {"label": "Subject", "fieldname": "subject", "fieldtype": "Data", "width": 200},
        {"label": "Status", "fieldname": "status", "fieldtype": "Select", "width": 100},
        {"label": "Customer Name", "fieldname": "custom_customer_name", "fieldtype": "Link", "options": "HD Customer", "width": 180},
    ]

    data = frappe.get_all(
        "HD Ticket",
        fields=["name", "subject", "status", "custom_customer_name"],
    )
    return columns, data
